dc:title: High Body Mass Index in Children and Adolescents: Interventions
dc:description:
Children and adolescents 6 years or older:
The USPSTF recommends that clinicians should provide or refer children and adolescents 6 years or older with a high body mass index (BMI) (â‰¥95th percentile for age and sex) to comprehensive, intensive behavioral interventions.
Grade: B
